channel.title: CambridgeAnalytica on LRG
channel.description: Recent content in CambridgeAnalytica on LRG

item.title: Tweet
item.description: Beginning to wonder if the whole #CambridgeAnalytica thing is a ‘get out of jail’ card for neo-libs. Instead of ‘we extracted the wealth from the poorest in society, ignored them and allowed fascism to take root’ it’s ‘SEE! The Facebook / Russians / internet did it!’ #justsaying ‚ù§Ô∏è 1 | üîÉ 0
